name: Sprouts Potato Cutlets/Burger Patty
description: Sprouts Potato Cutlets. Delicious vegan burger patties that are healthy and so easy and fun to make. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mung bean sprouts or any other sprouts you like. (( I sprouted the green mung for 2 days so the sprout was about 1/4 inch))
1/2 cup bread crumbs or 1 slice bread toasted and coarsely blended.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add in all the ingredients except flour and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add in all the ingredients except flour and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Try to make patties out of the mixture. If the mixture is too soggy, then add the flour and more bread crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Try to make patties out of the mixture. If the mixture is too soggy, then add the flour and more bread crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Shallow fry the patties on medium heat for 2-3 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Shallow fry the patties on medium heat for 2-3 minutes each side.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with cilantro chutney and sweet tamarind chutney!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with cilantro chutney and sweet tamarind chutney!

recipeInstructions.text: I also made some sandwiches with the patties topped with cilantro chutney, some cherry tomatoes, lettuce and some dijon mustard. Enjoy!
